attributes.title: cost me everything
attributes.review: this app is a curse. due to this app i lost everything-including my own life. i died yesterday morning choking on water because i got reminded that i have this app (which supports a racist, sexist and homophobic cheeto) on my phone.

attributes.title: #mannyflag
attributes.review:
this app was useless . when you first open it you just see a orange, racist, homophobic, sexist, creep, and rapist person . i don’t think you should download it bc it will try to brainwash you into thinking that a cheeto is a good president/person . obviously he is not . 

x.o.x.o. gen z . ❤️

attributes.title: If you or a loved one...
attributes.review: this app made me receive mesothelioma and i am just here for my settlement money!!

attributes.title: will be deleting immediately
attributes.review: this app took up an absurd amount of storage on my phone. although this app is absolute garbage, the the orange guy with the funny looking hair did make me laugh. 10/10 wouldn’t download again.

attributes.title: Awful app 😷😷
